title: OPL codes
body:
Just curious what skins were given out this year. Forsaken Jayce? 

Thanks

replies.body: Is that all?? No new special skin? That's a bit lame.

> [{quoted}](name=whitehatingcoon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uEglwPqA,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-08-09T15:04:21.488+0000)
>
> Is that all?? No new special skin? That's a bit lame.

why would they make a special skin?
It was the OPL grand final. You got to Pax and you get skins. So you think they would of had something made up special for the oceanic servers to celebrate our grand final.

Hi Guys, each year we give out skins that are part of our normal catalogue. It's a very long process to create a new skin. If you head over [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/iFdEkXnp-riot-oce-update-and-qa) you can read some more information on the server skin.
The OPL showbags contained the Forsaken Jayce skin and there was a scavenger hunt at Luna Park for the Astro Nautilus skin :)
